entry.content:

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.57.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Fix view error when filtering on tag by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1918
  • Don't redirect back to deleted files or models by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1928
  • Fix models with square brackets in folder name not scanning properly by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1932

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Update to Node.js 20 by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1908
  • Remove some unnecessary JS dependencies by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1906
  • Enable CodeQL security scanning by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1909
  • Fix or tighten up all lint errors or exemptions by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1910
  • Improve navbar path generation by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1919
  • Fix docker builds and add pre-merge build for PRs by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1926

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.57.1...v0.57.2

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.58.0
entry.content:
In this release, two new translations! We have a complete French translation thanks to @clepoittevin and @Andreaj42, and mostly-complete Polish thanks to @XioR112! There are also some improvements to some untranslated German text from @ZwiebelTVDE.

There's also a lot of work behind the scenes to support multiple users; most of this is invisible still for now, but it's definitely coming soon!

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Polish translation by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1898
  • French translation by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1946

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Fix ActiveAdmin tabs for libraries, models, problems, and more by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1949
  • Fix policy setting for user on settings page by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1954

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Add edge tag for main branch docker build by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1933
  • Translate add/remove tag labels properly by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1934
  • Behind-the-scenes support for user login and registration by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1920
  • Extract reusable workflow steps into composite action by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1936
  • Add feature flagging with Flipper by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1935
  • Refactor request specs for future implementation by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1938
  • Minor DE & PL translation updates by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1942
  • Add permission verification onto all actions by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1940
  • Updates to PL and DE translations by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1952

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.57.2...v0.58.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.59.0
entry.content:
üåü This is a BIG one; Manyfold is going multi-user! üåü

By default it will continue in the same single-user mode you've known up to now, but if you want, you can turn it on.

First thing you'll notice is that you will HAVE to set a password for an administrator user. This user has been there hidden away for ages, but now you need to set a password for it. We do this even if you're staying in single-user mode, so that things are secure if you turn on multiuser later.

To enable multiuser, you'll need to set an environment variable, MULTIUSER=enabled in your Docker configuration. You can also set REGISTRATION=enabled to allow users to sign up for their own accounts. Otherwise, an admin will need to add new users manually using the advanced administration interface. See our configuration docs for more details.

In multiuser mode, all users MUST log in to see anything. There are then user roles which an admin can edit in advanced administration:

  • viewer: read-only access; every user gets this by default.
  • contributor: can upload models, and create new collections and creators (plus viewer).
  • editor: able to edit and delete content (plus contributor).
  • administrator: all-powerful; the same as the default single-user permissions.

Future releases will add more granular permissions, particularly around edit/create/delete access to individual models, creators, and so on. For now, everyone gets the same access to all content, so be aware, if you're letting friends into your instance, they can see everything!

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Enable multiple user accounts by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1955
  • Add user roles by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1963
  • Enforce permissions with the new user roles by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1965
  • Onboarding flow for admin user to set up username/email/password by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1969
  • Adapt UI features to user permissions by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1970

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Upgrade to Ruby 3.3.0 by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1907
  • Read .ruby-version into Gemfile by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1838
  • Improve autocreated user for single login, and change to lazy creation by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1964
  • Style pass for multiuser pages (login, registration, account settings) by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1967
  • Small polish translation update by @XioR112 in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1968
  • Add links to multiuser configuration documentation by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1972
  • Change preview button icon/style and hide for non-editors by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1973
  • Polish and French translation updates by @XioR112 and @Andreaj42 in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/1974

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.58.0...v0.59.0

entry.content:
What's Changed

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ
